snippet: The team fielded an ineligible player in a match Saturday, the latest error to embarrass African soccer in the 2014 World Cup qualifying cycle.
abstract: Cape Verde, tiny group of islands off West Africa bidding to become the smallest nation ever to qualify for the World Cup, is thrown out of competition for fielding an ineligible player in a qualifying match; episode is latest in a series of embarrassing administrative errors that have dogged African soccer in 2014 qualifying cycle.
lead_paragraph: The team fielded an ineligible player in a match Saturday, the latest error to embarrass African soccer in the 2014 World Cup qualifying cycle.

headline.main: Cape Verde Disqualified From World Cup Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Another Chaotic Episode In African Qualifying
